snippet.title: 30XX - 8 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description: Check out some exclusive gameplay of 30XX, a replayable roguelike Mega Man-style game and sequel to the excellent 20XX from developer Batterystaple Games, debuted during IGN's Summer of Gaming.

localized.description: Check out some exclusive gameplay of 30XX, a replayable roguelike Mega Man-style game and sequel to the excellent 20XX from developer Batterystaple Games, debuted during IGN's Summer of Gaming.
